languages.text: {n}Качнувшись в сторону, вы видите, как дуло стаб-револьвера Немезита плюется огнем. Над ухом раздается басовитое жужжание прошедшей мимо пули. Ваш черед!{/n}
{n}You lean to the side, and you see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now, it's your turn!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Качнувшись в сторону, вы видите, как дуло стаб-револьвера Немезита плюется огнем. Над ухом раздается басовитое жужжание прошедшей мимо пули. Ваш черед!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You sway to the side, and see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now it's your turn!{/n}
{n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver spit out fire and hear the bassy whirr of a bullet passing over your head.{/n}
{n}You lean to the side, and you see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now, it's your turn!{/n}
{n}You lean to the side, and you see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now, it's your turn!{/n}
{n}You lean to the side, and you see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now, it's your turn!{/n}
{n}You sway to the side, and see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now it's your turn!{/n}
{n}You lean to the side, and you see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now, it's your turn!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du lehnst dich zur Seite, siehst die Mündung von Nemesits Stummelrevolver aufblitzen und spürst das Surren einer Kugel, die nur knapp deinen Kopf verfehlt. Jetzt bist du am Zug!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean to the side, and you see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now, it's your turn!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du lehnst dich zur Seite, siehst die Mündung von Nemesits Stummelrevolver aufblitzen und spürst das Surren einer Kugel, die nur knapp deinen Kopf verfehlt. Jetzt bist du am Zug!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te inclinas hacia un lado y ves que el cañón del revólver compacto de Nemesitio estalla un instante antes de que el zumbido de una bala pase por encima de tu cabeza. ¡Ahora te toca a ti!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean to the side, and you see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now, it's your turn!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te inclinas hacia un lado y ves que el cañón del revólver compacto de Nemesitio estalla un instante antes de que el zumbido de una bala pase por encima de tu cabeza. ¡Ahora te toca a ti!{/n}

languages.text: {n}体を横へと動かすと同時にネメサイトのリボルバーの銃口が火を噴き、弾丸の低い音が頭の上を通り過ぎるのが見えた。さあ、次はあなたの番だ！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean to the side, and you see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now, it's your turn!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}体を横へと動かすと同時にネメサイトのリボルバーの銃口が火を噴き、弾丸の低い音が頭の上を通り過ぎるのが見えた。さあ、次はあなたの番だ！{/n}

languages.text: {n}你侧过身子，看到涅墨斯特手中的短筒左轮手枪喷出了火焰。随后，一颗子弹贴着你头顶飞过。是时候反击了！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean to the side, and you see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now, it's your turn!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你侧过身子，看到涅墨斯特手中的短筒左轮手枪喷出了火焰。随后，一颗子弹贴着你头顶飞过。是时候反击了！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous penchez sur le côté au moment où la bouche du revolver de Némésite s'enflamme, crachant une balle qui passe juste au-dessus de votre tête. À votre tour, maintenant !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean to the side, and you see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now, it's your turn!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous penchez sur le côté au moment où la bouche du revolver de Némésite s'enflamme, crachant une balle qui passe juste au-dessus de votre tête. À votre tour, maintenant !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yana eğiliyorsun. Bir merminin vızıldayarak kafanın tam üzerinden geçtiği esnada Nemezit'in bodur altıpatlarının ağzının alev püskürttüğünü görüyorsun. Şimdi sıra sende!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean to the side, and you see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire as the low whirr of a bullet passes over your head. Now, it's your turn!{/n}
